name: context-action-monorepo
description: Monorepo for context-action library and test environment

scripts.prerelease: pnpm build:all && pnpm lint && pnpm type-check
scripts.release:patch: pnpm version:patch && pnpm prerelease && pnpm publish:all
scripts.release:minor: pnpm version:minor && pnpm prerelease && pnpm publish:all
scripts.release:major: pnpm version:major && pnpm prerelease && pnpm publish:all
scripts.publish:all: pnpm --filter @context-action/core publish --access public && pnpm --filter @context-action/react publish --access public

author: mineclover
